channel.title: Comments on: Murder By Death continues its endless tour, starts 7″ series

item.title: By: Rock and Roll Mama
item.dc:creator: Rock and Roll Mama
item.description: Oooh. I love these guys, and I love WEW. I'm going to try to hit that Ottobar show. I've seen both before supporting Clutch, and they never fail to amaze. Thanks for the heads up.
item.content:encoded: Oooh. I love these guys, and I love WEW. I’m going to try to hit that Ottobar show. I’ve seen both before supporting Clutch, and they never fail to amaze. Thanks for the heads up.

item.title: By: K
